mapper.select: select * from product order by pCode
mapper.insert: insert into product (pCode, kCode, tCode, pName, aId, pUphit) values (#{product_SEQ.nextval}, #{kCode}, #{tCode}, #{pName}, #{aId}, 0)
mapper.update: update product set kCode=#{kCode}, tCode=#{tCode}, pName=#{pName}, aId=#{aId} where pCode=#{pCode}
